Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
matey \matey\ adj. having the relationship of friends or pals. [colloquial]
Syn: chummy, pally, palsy-walsy. [WordNet 1.5]
matey adj : (used colloquially) having the relationship of friends or pals [syn: {chummy}, {pally}, {palsy-walsy}]
